information_key3: NavGurukul ke laptops, jo kisi ko bhi assign nahi kiye gaye hain, ka dhyaan rakhna
information_key4: New students ko laptop dena, laptop ki list banana aur unke allocation ke liye ek process define karna aur use document karna
information_key5: Curriculum ke according har 45 days me random tareeke se students ko laptops reallocate karna (eg. Android students ko 8GB+ dena, iOS students ko Macbook dena)
information_key6: Kisi bhi laptop ko repair karwana aur uska dhyaan rakhna
information_key7: Internet problems ko resolve karne ke liye data collect karna, solutions dhundhna aur unhe implement karna
information_key8: Appropriate communication channel par aise sabhi decisions ko document karna
